summary: I am selling a couple of watches that I have not worn in a very long time.  All are in excellent condition, the Ocean Diver Chronograph is new old stock (NOS) and has never been worn.  It is in factory perfect condition

summary:
Three men in the United Kingdom have pleaded guilty to operating otp[. ]agency, a once popular online service that helped attackers intercept the one-time passcodes (OTPs) that many websites require as a second authentication factor in addition to passwords. 

Launched in November 2019, OTP Agency was a service for intercepting one-time passwords needed to log in to various websites...
title: Owners of 1-Time Passcode Theft Service Plead Guilty
